dmca.title: Google DMCA - SEO Image
dmca.body:
November 16, 2006

Sender Information: SEO Image, Inc.
Sent by: CEO
115 East 57th Street 11th Floor
New York, NY 10022

Recipient Information:
Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
Google, Inc.
Mountain View, CA, 94043, USA

Sent via: fax and email
Dear Google Customer Support Professionals,
1)The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on: http://www.seoimage.com/web_design.html
http://www.seoimage.com/web_design-1.html

2)Search Query:
"Our high quality custom design services compliment our amazing search engine placement services."
http://www.google.com/search?q=%22Our+high+quality+custom+design+services+compliment+our+amazing+search+engine+placement+services.%22&hl=en&Ir=&filter=0

Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.creativatorz.com/professional-web-designers-india.htm http://www.creativatorz.com/professional-web-designers-india.php

2) Search Query:
"We know how to market your website, and we also know how to market your websites' design"
http://www.google.com/search?a=%22We+know+how+to+make+your+website,+and+we+also+know+how+to+market+your+websites%27+design%&hl=en&Ir=&filter=0

Infringing Pages:
http://www.creativatorz.com/creativatorz-website-design-development.htm http://www.creativatorz.com/web-design-development.php http://www.creativatorz.com/web-design-development.htm
http://www.creativatorz.com/creativatorz-website-design-development.php http://www.creativatorz.com/website-designers-india.php
http://www.creativatorz.com/professional-web-designers-india.htm http://www.creativatorz.com/website-designers-india.htm http://www.creativatorz.com/web-designers-india.php http://www.creativatorz.com/indian-web-desian-companv.php http://www.creativatorz.com/professional-web-designers-india.php

1)The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on: http://www.seoimage.com/web_design-1.html

2)Search Query:
"Choosing the right design solution from the get-go can mean the difference between a customer service liability and a smoothly operating profit center" http://www.google.com/search?q =%22Choosing+the+right+design+solution+from+the+get-
go+can+mean+the+difference+between+a+customer+service+liability+and+a+smoothly+operating+profit+center%22&hI=en&Ir=&filter=0

Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.creativatorz.com/professional-web-designers-india.htm http://www.creativatorz.com/web-design-development.htm
http://www.creativatorz.com/creativatorz-website-design-development.htm htto://www.creativatorz.com/web-design-development.php
http://www.creativatorz.com/creativatorz-website-design-development.php http://www.creativatorz.com/indian-web-design-company.php
http://www.creativatorz.com/professional-web-designers-india.php http://www.creativatorz.com/website-designers-india.php http://www.creativatorz.com/web-desigpers-india.php
http://www.creativatorz.com/website-designers-india.htm

OLD Complaint website is still listing these pages we filed the complaint here:
http://www.chillingeffects.org/notice.cgi?sID=758

1)The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on: http://www.seoimage.com/seo_services.html

ORIGINAL PAGE is a Registered Copyright version is listed here: http://www.seoimage.com/seo_services-l.html

2)Search Query:
"If your site is already listed in the search engines, we will then check to see if the current title, placement"
http://www.google.com/search?hI=en&Ir=&safe=off&q=%22If+your+site+is+already+listed+in+the+search+engines%2C+we+will+then+check+to+see+if+the+current+title%ZC+placement%22&btnG=Search

Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.creativatorz.com/creativatorz-search-engine-optimization.htm http://www.creativatorz.com/search-engine-submission.htm

These pages are still indexed and should have been removed from the first complaint.

3)My Contact Information:
seo@seoimage.com
212-845-9900 x802

4)Infringer's Contact Information:
WHOIS:
Monga, Rishu
Creativizt Communications
126/45'A', Block-T
Govind Nagar
Kanpur 208006
India
919811658305
Ph: (011)41326645
info@creativatorz.com
rishumonga@rediffmail.com
http://www.creativatorz.com/contact.htm

5)I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6)I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

Alan Rabinowitz CEO
SEO Image, Inc.
115 East 57th Street
11th Floor
New York, NY 10022
Registered Copyright Number: TXu1-270-870
